profile.name: MD Shoaib Khan
profile.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
profile.description: I build accessible, pixel-perfect, and performant web experiences. Turning ideas into real-life products is my calling.

text: I'm a versatile developer specializing in the intersection of design and cutting-edge technology. My journey began with web customization years ago, and today I build high-performance, AI-powered solutions across multiple platforms.

I specialize in developing intelligent web ecosystems, machine learning integrations, and native Android and iOS applications. I focus on creating AI-integrated experiences that are not only visually stunning but also redefine user interaction through smart, efficient technology.

experience.description: Leading a team of developers to build scalable AI-driven web applications. Architecting cloud solutions using AWS and Docker.
Developed and maintained multiple client websites using React and Node.js. Improved site performance by 40%.
Collaborated with designers to implement responsive UI/UX. Built RESTful APIs for mobile applications.

projects.name: Meal Sphere
projects.description: Meal planning and recipe sharing platform.

projects.name: AI Agent
projects.description: Intelligent agent platform leveraging NLP and automation for productivity.

projects.name: Pregnify
projects.description: AI-powered platform for personalized pregnancy risk prediction, real-time health monitoring, and seamless patient-doctor communication.

projects.name: Supershop Management System
projects.description: Spring Boot-based inventory & sales management application.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building responsive, high-performance websites using reliable technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.js.

services.title: Mobile App Development
services.description: Creating native Android and iOS applications with Flutter and React Native for seamless user experiences.

services.title: AI Solutions
services.description: Integrating machine learning models and AI agents to automate workflows and enhance business intelligence.

testimonials.name: Sarah Jenkins

testimonials.feedback: The AI agents Shoaib developed for us transformed our workflow. Fast, reliable, and incredibly smart.
